pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarissā visikhāya piṇḍāya caramānā yena aññataraṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.4: Atha kho te manussā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ bhojetvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.7: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo nāgaccheyyun”ti, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.8: “amukasmiṃ, ayye, okāse vāḷā sunakhā caṇḍo balibaddo cikkhallo okāso.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.10: Aññatarāpi bhikkhunī tassā visikhāya piṇḍāya caramānā yena taṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:6.12: Atha kho te manussā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ bhojetvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.1: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tesaṃ manussānaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī kulaṃ maccharāyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:11.2: “kathaṃ bhikkhuniyo nāgaccheyyun”ti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike kulassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:11.3: Kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:12.2: kulaṃ na maccharāyantī santaṃyeva ādīnavaṃ ācikkhati, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
